snippet: Marco Reus scored one goal and set up one as Borussia Dortmund beat Mainz, 4-2, to escape the Bundesliga relegation zone.
abstract: Borussia Dortmund beats Mainz, 4-2; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marco Reus scored one goal and set up one as Borussia Dortmund beat Mainz, 4-2, to escape the Bundesliga relegation zone.

headline.main: Borussia Dortmund Gets Out of Relegation Zone
